name: Prototipando like a Rockstar 🔥🤘
description:
Here you will be able to resolve some of the typical doubts while prototyping in figma and "blow your mind" animations more advanced 🔥 MUAHAHA


Let's be a rockstars together jojo! And let's prototype! 🤘


Note: this is the Figma file from a Friends of Figma meetup I did, so you can go to the youtube video and have more context and feedback 😳 [in Spanish]


Meetup video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6uR1pNFyeO8


---


More about me

I'm Ivan Garcia, product designer at Lidl International Hub (SCRM) and spanish design content creator (I make videos with tips, theory and practical design with humor 🤓)
